page.title: 04HOUSING-LIFE IN OFFLEY.
page.content: 50% of Offley people live in semi- detached houses, 25% in detached, 13% in bungalows, 6% in sheltered housing 4% in flats and 2% didn't respond to the question. Approximately 50% of the houses have garages. Most gardens in Offley are in excess of 1/4 acre and 62.5% of the householders produce some of their own food. 45 of the houses use solid fuel, 17 use oil, 14 use electricity and 11 use Calor gas as their source of energy. 47% of the householders keep animals as pets. 85% of the householders have telephones, 98% have television sets, 93% have radios, 10% have computers, 21% have videos, 81% have washing machines, 9% have dish-washers. 34% use the Hitchin library and 29% use the mobile library which visits the village fortnightly.
